external_games.name: AURA: Hentai Cards - Revenge of the Fox Spirit DLC

name: Aura: Hentai Cards - Revenge of the Fox Spirit
summary: Strange disappearances of men have begun in the steampunk town of KongGong, so cat detective Miyu is sent there for investigation. Here, in this unusual place, technology has begun to supplant magic, but one ancient spirit clearly doesn't like it...
